content.prompt: Which of the following activities poses the greatest personal cybersecurity risk?

choices.label: Making a purchase at an online store that uses public key encryption to transmit credit card information
Paying a bill using a secure electronic payment system
Reserving a hotel room by e-mailing a credit card number to a hotel
Withdrawing money from a bank account using an automated teller machine (ATM)

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Describe the impact of gathering data.
